sentence.Network_en: I had gone to watch the fireworks, one Fourth of July.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一年七月四日我去观看烟火晚会.

sentence.Network_en: They gave the value of one - fourth of all the movable property that they owned.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们捐出了他们全部动产的 四分之一 的钱.

sentence.Network_en: They found the virus in almost one - fourth of them.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们发现有 四分之一 的巢穴感染了这种病毒.
